channel.title: Cannes Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cannes Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Why Joachim Trier Dropped the Irony in ‘Sentimental Value’: “I Had to Be a Better Director”
item.description: With his new film, the Danish-Norwegian director plays it straight for an emotionally direct family drama: “With this one, I needed to talk about intimate, more tender things.”

item.title: Why Joachim Trier Dropped the Irony in ‘Sentimental Value’: “I Had to Be a Better Director”
item.description: With his new film, the Danish-Norwegian director plays it straight for an emotionally direct family drama: “With this one, I needed to talk about intimate, more tender things.”

item.title: Zoey Deutch Plays Jean Seberg in Richard Linklater’s ‘Nouvelle Vague’ Trailer From Netflix
item.description: The film premiered at Cannes and centers on the shoot for Jean-Luc Godard’s ‘Breathless.’

item.title: Zoey Deutch Plays Jean Seberg in Richard Linklater’s ‘Nouvelle Vague’ Trailer From Netflix
item.description: The film premiered at Cannes and centers on the shoot for Jean-Luc Godard’s ‘Breathless.’

item.title: Jennifer Lawrence, Robert Pattinson Lose Their Cool in Lynne Ramsay’s ‘Die My Love’ Trailer
item.description: Martin Scorsese produced the psychological drama that hits theaters this fall following its Cannes premiere.

item.title: Jennifer Lawrence, Robert Pattinson Lose Their Cool in Lynne Ramsay’s ‘Die My Love’ Trailer
item.description: Martin Scorsese produced the psychological drama that hits theaters this fall following its Cannes premiere.

item.title: Film Movement Takes North American Distribution Rights for Cannes, Toronto Title ‘Renoir’ (EXCLUSIVE)

item.title: Norway Picks Joachim Trier’s ‘Sentimental Value’ for the International Feature Oscar Race
item.description: Norway has chosen Joachim Trier’s “Sentimental Value” starring Renate Reinsve to enter the Oscars’ international feature film race. The movie world premiered at Cannes where it

item.title: Harris Dickinson’s Directorial Debut ‘Urchin’ Lands Fall Release After Cannes Wins
item.description: Frank Dillane stars as a London-based addict in the feature that premiered earlier this year in France.
